ddf.catalog.impl.operations

Class QueryOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • ddf.catalog.util.impl.DescribableImpl
      • ddf.catalog.impl.operations.QueryOperations
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Describable

    public class QueryOperations
extends DescribableImpl
    Support class for query delegate operations for the CatalogFrameworkImpl.

    This class contains two delegated query methods and methods to support them. No operations/support methods should be added to this class except in support of CFI query operations.

      • replaceSourceId

        public QueryResponse replaceSourceId(QueryResponse queryResponse)
        Replaces the site name(s) of FederatedSources in the QueryResponse with the fanout's site name to keep info about the FederatedSources hidden from the external client.
        Parameters:
        queryResponse - the original QueryResponse from the query request
        Returns:
        the updated QueryResponse with all site names replaced with fanout's site name
